title.rendered: Introducing Sean Cardenas, SVP of Global Sales at Incopro

content.rendered:
Incopro is pleased to announce that Sean Cardenas will be joining the company as SVP of Global Sales. Sean will be leading sales globally and will be based out of Los Angeles as part of our investment in scaling our North American operations.

Sean’s appointment comes at a time of rapid growth for Incopro in the US as we service current customers and rapidly win new business across major enterprises and sectors. The US is now Incopro’s largest expanding market, with triple-digit growth over each of the previous years as leading businesses continue to embrace Incopro’s approach to consumer protection and brand safety.

Sean joins us from Plethora where he was VP of Sales. Prior to that, he has held a number of sales leadership roles across technology businesses from start-ups right through to global corporates such as NetApp and Dell EMC. He brings 20+ years of sales leadership in high-growth technology companies, including multiple IPOs. 

Simon Baggs, CEO and co-founder of Incopro said “I am really enthused by the further leadership that Sean brings to Incopro, especially as we continue to expand in the US market. Sean brings a welcome focus on excellence to our drive for a collaborative partnership with our future customers – helping us deliver on our mission to make the Internet better for business and consumers.”
